title: Let Your Living Water Flow
lyrics: 1. Let Your liv - ing wa - ter flow o - ver my soul.
2. Come now, Ho - ly Spir - it, and take con - trol.
Let Your Ho - ly Spir - it come and take con - trol of
Hold me in Your lov - ing arms and make me whole.
ev - 'ry sit - u - a - tion that has trou - bled my mind.
Wipe a - way all doubt and fear and take my pride.
All my cares and bur - dens on - to You I roll.
Draw me to Your love and keep me by Your side.
